commentBody:
The Jets should have beaten them the first time around. Beating the Jets and many of the lame opponents they have beaten doesn't make a great team.
The playoffs will be the true test. Anyway, right now the Jets are the laughing stock of the NFL. They do nothing well, not on offense, not on defense, not on special teams. Thankfully for Jet fans, only one more loss remains.

replies.commentBody:
The Ravens, Steelers and Broncos are all great teams, all trying to get in the playoffs.

Outside of Cyrus Jones's efforts to keep the Ravens in the game, none of these have been close games.
